channel.title: Sound doesn't work
channel.description: I installed the game today, and it runs absolutely perfect, but I have no sound. I have tried most of the regular fixes for hl2.exe (i.e, -dxlevel properties command) but I still can't hear anything. Also, I'm playing on a Macbook Pro, Win XP SP3 on Parallels. I can't be the only one who's having this problem.

item.title: Sound doesn't work
item.dc:creator: Nikaki
item.description:
I had the same problem in other games. Turns out I had forgotten to update my DirectX installation after a fresh Windows install. Download “dxwebsetup.exe” from Microsoft and run it:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35

Read full topic

item.title: Sound doesn't work
item.dc:creator: TehHpyfce
item.description:
I installed the game today, and it runs absolutely perfect, but I have no sound. I have tried most of the regular fixes for hl2.exe (i.e, -dxlevel properties command) but I still can’t hear anything. Also, I’m playing on a Macbook Pro, Win XP SP3 on Parallels. I can’t be the only one who’s having this problem.
